# ObjectAnchor.ID

**Type Alias**

A type representing the stable identity of the entity associated with an instance.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ID = UUID
```

## Inspecting and comparing anchors

- **id**: The unique identifier of this anchor.

items.description: The unique identifier of this anchor.
items.name: id
